question: C++ Array: Two Sum - Store index in map.

question: C++ Array: Best Time to Buy/Sell Stock - Update min price.

question: C++ Array: Majority Element - Moore's Voting Algorithm.

question: C++ Array: Move Zeroes - Swap non-zero elements.
hint: Swap the current element with the last non-zero position.

question: C++ Array: Missing Number - Sum formula logic.

question: C++ Linked List: Reverse List - Update next pointer.

question: C++ Matrix: Set Zeroes - Mark first column.

question: C++ Array: Product Except Self - Right pass multiplication.
hint: Update the running product with the current element.

question: C++ Linked List: Merge Two Lists - recursive call.
hint: Return the node that has the smaller value.

question: C++ Array: Container With Most Water - Move pointer.

question: C++ Matrix: Rotate Image - Transpose swap.

question: C++ Linked List: Remove Nth Node From End - Gap creation.

question: C++ Array: Search Insert Position - Binary Search.
hint: If target is larger, search the right half.

question: C++ Linked List: Middle Node - Loop condition.
hint: Check if the next node exists for the fast pointer.

question: C++ Array: Merge Sorted Array - Fill from back.

question: C++ Matrix: Number of Islands - DFS check.
hint: Base case for recursion if out of bounds or water.

question: C++ Array: 3Sum - Skip duplicates.
